data.name: Fujiwara Bittersweet
data.detailed_description:
Fujiwara Bittersweet is a GxB Otome/Visual Novel, slice of life, with cute but somehow dark theme.

Story

"Aya just moved to a new little town near the mountains. Her new life as a high school freshman begins now, join her as she navigates through life and meets new people. Will she make friends or perhaps… find herself falling in love?"

TW: /!\ R16+ due to death, swearing, drugs, possible sexual (mostly sex jokes, the other "sexual" stuff is more flirt and touching than anything) content and other sensitive subjects /!\

Features

  • Free!
  • ~270,000 words
  • ~ more than 45,000 words by route
  • 6 unique routes with two endings each
  • Happy Ends for everyone (Friend and Sweet)!
  • ~+15 CGs
  • Original sprites/BGs

GAMEPLAY NOTES

You can earn Friend or Sweet points when encoutering a choice during the story, which will lead you to one route or another.

Recommended order to follow the routes:
  • Ikki (clover leaf)
  • Toshio (cigarettes)
  • Yuta (headphones)
  • Haru (bracelet)
  • Kenji (keychain)
  • Ryu (herbal tea)

Characters













CREDITS
  • Art & Story : Karamelow
  • Editing & Proofreading : Giazg, Vesper, Akatea, YoshiBB & Fairfaxlease
  • Music : Alyx (TiberAlyx)

data.short_description: Girl protag heartwarming slice of life with bittersweet twists!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Violence, Blood, Mention of child abuse (beating), Suicide Attempt, Mental Illness, Mention of Cult, Drug
